title: Did Hillary Clinton Steal $200,000 in White House Furnishings?
subtitle: An Internet meme claiming that Hillary Clinton was forced to return $200,000 worth of furniture, china and art she "stole" from the White House is based on a grain of truth.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Clintons were forced to return an estimated $200,000 in furniture, china and art they "stole" from the White House.
